product_name: Tune Belt Sport Armband for iPhone Cases
long_description: Rock out during your workout with the lightweight and comfortable Sport Armband for iPhone(R) cases from Tune Belt. Designed to accommodate an iPhone 4/4s in a larger, protective case like the Otterbox iPhone 4 Defender; protective case not included. Tune Belt Sport Armband also securely stores and manages your headphone cord. Clear front lets you operate iPhone while it's in Sport Armband for quick track changes. Adjustable armband fits arms measuring 9 in. to 17 in.
short_description: Rock out during your workout with the lightweight and comfortable Sport Armband for iPhone(R) cases from Tune Belt.
